ygData.subject: Re: Will not sufficient??
ygData.msgSnippet: Just saying this because that proves you are low level. the base damage of the dark reaver is 20. at levels 1-20 your damage multiplier is x2 + 1 the base
ygData.messageBody:
Just saying this because that proves you are low level.

the base damage of the dark reaver is 20.
at levels 1-20 your damage multiplier is x2 + 1 the base damage of the
weapon. This proves you are very low level for that sword.

I am not sure of the damage multipliers over 20, but I know that a level 20
warrior with the executioners axe can do 100 damage, 4x(damage multiplier
for level 20) 25(base damage of axe)

if you were level 40 with the dark reaver, THE LEVEL YOU SHOULD BE! then you
would be doing damage in the high 100s.

just to let you know I AM EXTREMELY glad verant put a counter to bust cheap
bastards like you.

>From: "Howard Chan" <hchan@...>
>Reply-To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
>To: <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] Will not sufficient??
>Date: Mon, 14 Jun 1999 13:29:59 -0600
>
>From: "Howard Chan" <hchan@...>
>
>Excuses me? I DID NOT 'tweak' to obtain my Dark Reaver. I worked long and
>hard for it. Please do not condemn others when they are simply more wealthy
>than you are. Oh well, at least I hit for 47 at my 'low' level while you
>are
>still using your rusty two handed sword.
>
>
> >little puke would find his butt rooted and looted as soon as he said Dark
> >Reaver.
>
>
